description: Intended primarily for music majors, this course introduces basic techniques for performance on the
trumpet, horn, trombone, euphonium and tuba.  Each student develops a basic proficiency on any
three of these instruments.  Pedagogical techniques, repertoire, literature and instrument
maintenance are also included.  Students play a solo with piano accompaniment and perform
with the class ensemble at the end of the term.  Offered Spring Semester.
